src_original: daśapāramitā śuddhirdaśapāramitānayaḥ || 2 || ||
tgt_original: 淨十波羅蜜　　十波羅蜜教

src_original: daśabhumi śvarānāthoda daśabhumīśvaronātho daśabhūmī pratichitaḥ ||
tgt_original: 十地自在尊　　十地善安住

src_original: daśajñāna viśuddhātmā daśāna viśuddhidhṛkaḥ || 3 || ||
tgt_original: 十智清淨我　　十智淨堅固

src_original: daśākārā daśārthīryo munīṁdro daśabalo vittuḥ || ||  aśeṣa viśvārthakaro daśākāra vaśīmahānu || 4 || ||
tgt_original: 十相十種義　　十力寂諸根 最勝真常義　　十相最寂靜

src_original: anādi niṣprapaṁcātmā śuddhātmā tathatātmakaḥ (13)
tgt_original: 遠離諸戲論　　我及真如淨

src_original: dhāriṇīsaṁgraha bhūtavādī tathāvādī tathākārī ananya vāk || 5 ||
tgt_original: 如語真實語　　如理行無異

src_original: advayau dvayavādī ca bhūta koṭī vyavāstitaḥ nairāmya siṁha nirnādaḥ kutīrthya mṛga bhīkaraḥ || 6 ||
tgt_original: 無二說二語　　皆住真實際

src_original: saddharmo dharmarāḍa bhāsvān lookā lokakaraḥ || 2 ||
tgt_original: 正法光明聚　　照世出世間

src_original: dharmeśvaro dharmmarājāśe yogā rgopade śakaḥ || 14 ||
tgt_original: 法王法自在　　宣說最勝道

src_original: siddhārthaḥ siddha saṁkalpaḥ sarva saṁkalpa varjitaḥ ||
tgt_original: 分別成就義　　離諸分別相

src_original: nivikalpokṣayo dhātu rddharmadhātuḥ parovyayaḥ | 15 ||
tgt_original: 彼分別界盡　　顯最上法界

src_original: puṇyavāna puṇya saṁbhāro jñānaṁ jñānākara mahat |
tgt_original: 福語福所生　　大智智所作

src_original: jñāna vānmada sadjñānī saṁbhāradvaya saṁbhṛtaḥ || 16 ||  śāśvate viśva rādayo gīdhyānadhyeyo dhiyāṁpātiḥ ||
tgt_original: 當起正智想　　二法從是生 畢竟離眾相　　相應定自在

src_original: prayatmavai dayo kavalaḥ paramādaya mtri kāyadhṛka || 17 ||
tgt_original: 不動大主宰　　三身勝根本

src_original: paṁcakāyātmako buddhaḥ paṁcajñānātmako vituḥ |
tgt_original: 五身正智主　　五智大自在

src_original: vāgīśvaro mahāvādī vādirāḥ vādi pūṁgavaḥ ||  vadanāṁvaro variṣṭho vādisiṁhā parājitaḥ || 25 ||
tgt_original: 語自在大語　　勝語最上語 無勝師子吼　　無上無比等

src_original: samaṁtadarśī prāmotha snejomālī sudarśanaḥ ||  śrīi vatsaḥ sulapranodīkī rbhābhā surakaraya tiḥ || 26 ||
tgt_original: 普現身大喜　　或現火鬘相 或吉祥妙光　　大光明熾盛

src_original: mahāhiṣāvaraḥ śreṣṭhasyaha rkrānirakaraḥ ||  aśeṣa bhaiṣa cakranaraḥ kreśavādhi mahāripuḥ || 27 ||
tgt_original: 一切勝自在　　離染法最上 如無勝妙藥　　治諸煩惱怨

src_original: trailokotilakaḥ kāṁtaḥ śrīmāna śṛtamaṁḍaleḥ ||
tgt_original: 三界大吉祥　　眾星曼拏羅

src_original: daśadigaṁpomapapaino śarmadhva jaso madhekṛyaḥ || 28 ||  rajagacchava treka vipulo maitrīkarūnamaṁḍalaḥ ||
tgt_original: 建立大法幢　　表剎十方界 一廣大寶蓋　　遍覆於世間 慈悲二種法　　作大曼拏羅 大吉祥蓮華　　自在為嚴飾 最上寶蓋等　　周匝而莊嚴

src_original: sarva buddho me mahārājaḥ sarvabuddhātmabhāva dhṛka |
tgt_original: 諸佛大主宰　　諸佛心自性

src_original: sarva buddha mahāyoga ||  sarva buddheka śāsana || 30 ||
tgt_original: 諸佛大相應　　諸佛同一教

src_original: vajarattābhiṣeka ||  sarva lokeśvarapati sarvavajadharodhipaḥ || 31 ||
tgt_original: 金剛寶灌頂　　眾寶自在主 諸觀自在王　　諸執金剛尊

src_original: sarva buddha mahācikra sarva vaśyama ||  (21) nogatiḥ ||
tgt_original: 諸佛廣大心　　諸佛最上意

src_original: sarvabuddha mahākāyaḥ sarvabuddha sarasvatiḥ || 32 ||
tgt_original: 諸佛廣博身　　諸佛真實語

src_original: vanasūryamahāloka vaveṁdū vimalaprabhaḥ ||  virāmādi mahārāgo viśva vajña ghālaprabhaḥ || 33 ||
tgt_original: 金剛日大明　　金剛淨根本 眾色熾盛光　　照貪等自性

src_original: buddhāya odravaḥ śrīmāna sarvajña jñānakauśa dhrukā || 34 ||  viśva māyā dharā rājā buddha viyodhano mahāna ||  vajartī kaumahākhaśo viśuddhaḥ paramākṣaraḥ || 35 ||  duḥkhacchada mahāyānavaja dharṇamahāyudhaḥ ||  biṁna jigvajaggaṁ bhīryya vaja budhiryathāṣīvitā sarva pāramitā pūrī sarva bhūmi vibhuṣaṇaḥ ||  viśuddha dharmanerālyaḥ samyaka jñāne dūhatpataḥ ||
tgt_original: 一切智智藏　　正覺蓮華生

src_original: māyābāsamahādhyāmaḥ sarva maṁtrā dhipaḥ paraḥ ||
tgt_original: 眾幻化中主　　持明大覺尊

src_original: aśeṣa vaja paryakomiḥ śeṣa jñāna kāyadhruka || 38 ||
tgt_original: 大金剛利劍　　斷一切苦惱
